New Records: Rohit Sharma broke Sachin Tendulkar's record for the most hundreds in World Cups
Rohit Sharma equaled David Warner's record for the quickest 1000 runs in World Cups
Rohit Sharma broke Chris Gayle's record for most sixes in international cricket across formats
Rohit Sharma broke Kapil Dev's record for the fastest hundred by an Indian in World Cups
Rohit Sharma's 131 was also the highest score by an Indian batter in a successful run-chase in the World Cup
Rohit Sharma now has 31 ODI hundreds, one more than the legendary Ricky Ponting
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 4 for 39 off 10 overs
Ishan Kishan and Rohit Sharma shared a 156-run opening stand
Naveen-ul-Haq was the pick of the Afghanistan bowlers
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the match was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan have the kind of bowlers who could threaten the best of batsmen on their day
India, who have now won their matches so far in this World Cup, will take on Pakistan in Ahmedabad on Saturday
Others: India defeated Afghanistan by 8 wickets in Delhi
Hashmatullah Shahidi won the toss and decided to bat
Jasprit Bumrah was on fire for India
Kuldeep Yadav picked 1 wicket and gave away just 40 runs in his 10 overs
